transcription: My name is Omer and I'm studying Music and Sound for Image BA Hons. I decided to study at Huddersfield because the facilities here are some of the best in the country and the tutors here are some of the best professionals in their field. Nowhere else in the country really offers a course quite like this.  course I realised just how much an impact music can make in a film.
